item.title: Cyk006: New Wallpaper (992 911 GT3 premiere), Turew, 2021
item.description: This week, the new Porsche GT3 has itâ€™s premiere. The flagship model is painted in a beautiful Shark Blue colour and I couldn’t resist to create my own specification (just in case I have 1M PLN to spare ğŸ™ˆ). Renders from the configurator went directly to my desktops and they are replacing the previous gen Porsche! I really like this one, especially all the blue accents (Shark Blue seatbelts, blue rim and lights decors).
item.content:
This week, the new Porsche GT3 has itâ€™s premiere.

The flagship model is painted in a beautiful Shark Blue colour and I couldn’t resist to create my own specification (just in case I have 1M PLN to spare ğŸ™ˆ). Renders from the configurator went directly to my desktops and they are replacing the previous gen Porsche!

I really like this one, especially all the blue accents (Shark Blue seatbelts, blue rim and lights decors). I could definitely ride one! There should be a GT3 Touring version coming soon (no spoiler, manual only) and I’m really looking forward to see one!
